DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study obtain sufficient specimen correlate clinical data well-controlled prospective clinical trial collect specimen healthy , premenopausal subject support domestic international regulatory submission fertility biomarker assay , establish collection specimen support future assay discovery validation effort .
DOC.criteria: Females , age ≥ 21 year Premenopausal ( define woman least one menstrual cycle last 365 day ) . A minimum weight 110 lbs The subject anemic ( Hemoglobin ≥ 12.5 g/dL ) Willing provide daily blood draw one ovulatory cycle maximum 33 day Able understand willing provide inform consent . Males Females , age < 21 year Weighing < 110 lbs Anemic ( Hemoglobin < 12.5 g/dL ) History bilateral oophorectomy Females take form hormonal birth control include : Oral contraceptive pill ( combine progestinonly ) within five day enrollment . Contraceptive patch ( Ortho Evra® ) within seven day enrollment . Vaginal contraceptive ring ( NuvaRing™ ) within 21 day enrollment . Contraceptive injection ( DepoProvera® ) within 90 day enrollment . Intrauterine system ( IUS ) within 90 day enrollment . An intrauterine device ( IUD ) make copper exclude patient participate study . Subdermal contraceptive implant ( Nexplanon® ) within 90 day enrollment . Emergency contraceptive within 30 day enrollment . Women menopause ( defined end menstrual cycle least 365 day since last menstrual cycle ) Amenorrhea except woman continue ovulate document physician note available enrol center .
